message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement today. I am offering the product to you for $9500. This price includes all features and benefits as described, and I am confident it represents a great value for you.

Thanks for the offer Alice, I appreciate the gesture. However, $9500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'd be willing to pay $9000 for the product, considering its value to me. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to consider your offer further. My counteroffer to you is $9300 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our respective positions and I believe it provides a fair value for both parties.
